title: 820-00165 S0 Rails Pulsing
message: Got this board here which had no power. PP3V3_SUS was low, only 0.45V. I found corrosion under U8020, so I replaced it and got back PP3V3_SUS to normal. Now the board pulses all S0 rails in loop but does not turn on. I inspected whole board and could not find any more corrosion in it. Any ideas?

title: 820-00165 S0 Rails Pulsing
message:
Tried in SMC bypass?

Should be good to reball SMC.

title: 820-00165 S0 Rails Pulsing
message: In SMC bypass, it does a quarter fan spin and dies. Will try reballing it

title: 820-00165 S0 Rails Pulsing
message: Rebelling the SMC did nothing different to this board. Same thing, still pulsing S0

title: 820-00165 S0 Rails Pulsing
message:
CPU core coils pulsing too?
What about PLT_RESET_L?

title: 820-00165 S0 Rails Pulsing
message: CPU VCORE pulses too and also PLT_RESET_L

title: 820-00165 S0 Rails Pulsing
message:
POssibly accumulated crap under PCH.
Heat it with quality flux.
